title: Judge rules Google must limit its search, AI app default contracts on devices to one year
description: Google must now limit its partnerships with smartphone and other smart device developers, such as Apple and Samsung, when it comes to making its search engine or artificial intelligence app a default setting on the device.

title: AI Revolution in Assam: Training Teachers and Crafting Curriculums at IIT-Guwahati
description: IIT-Guwahati is spearheading the introduction of artificial intelligence into Assam's school curriculum by training teachers and preparing textbooks. Collaborating with faculty from Bhutan and northeastern states, the initiative includes an online programme and mentoring to increase student enrolment from rural areas. Full fee waivers support students in technology education.
content: In a pioneering educational move, IIT-Guwahati is incorporating artificial intelligence into Assam's school curriculum, taking the lead in training educators and crafting textbooks. This initiative, led by IIT-Guwahati's Director Prof Devendra Jaliha... [763 chars]

title: Trump Says Executive Order On AI Will Nullify State Rules

title: Trump Vows '1 Rule' AI Order to Stay Ahead of World
description: President Donald Trump is striking back after what he calls overzealous bad actor states that have been crippling the artificial intelligence boom in the U.S. with restrictions, obstruction, and oppressive regulations, vowing to impose a federal order of One Rule on AI.
